entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 36. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
